Next Generation - Are You Ready? Wednesday, October 17, 2012 l Alpharetta, GA
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
We hope that you will join us and fellow leaders in Public Safety where will discuss Next Generation 9-1-1 and introduce solutions to improve the workflow of your communications center.
- Unified user experience to interact with and incorporate new types of data such as text, pictures, video and more - Better integration of analysis and mapping with patrol work and fire response - Faster, more efficient call-taking protocols to deliver the right information at the right time. - Streamline false alarm administration and increase fee and fine collections - Reduce overheard IT costs with web-based fire records management - Ergonomic trends for improved personnel health and productivity
Register here: http://offers.tritech.com/GA_NG911Seminar.html <http://offers.tritech.com/GA_NG911Seminar.html>
Hope to see you there!
Questions? Michelle McClellan TriTech Software Systems (858) 799-7900 info@tritech.com EVENT DETAILS Don't want to miss this informative technology seminar? See details below and register today. Date: Wednesday, October 17
